statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPSubnet) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Subnets that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPSubnet)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP VPC-to-Subnet relationships that are out of date.
